author: hive-detective
title: WE ARE BACK !!
body:
![untitled.gif](https://media.tenor.com/2IhL_BoKbU0AAAAC/excited-dance.gif) . Psyberx didn't love our [first review](https://peakd.com/hive-140217/@hive-detectives/psyber-x-plagiarism-and-ip-theft) and they downvoted us to zero (using their users delegations) in order to try and silence us. ![untitled.gif](https://media.tenor.com/X6BbyGEv3P4AAAAC/stephanie-tanner-full-house.gif) . So, here again, like a phoenix that always reborns from its ashes. . #
PS. reputation restored - this will be a backup account
# . This initiative strives for quality on the Hive blockchain, aiming to benefit the community as a whole. We won't be reviewing individual users; there are already a couple of initiatives on Hive covering that ground. Instead, we want users to suggest DHF proposals, projects, games, or guilds for us to review. Feel free to use the "review-suggestions" category and all related channels: #dhf-proposals, #defi-projects, #games, #guilds, #others. For regular users, slowdowns
